MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD15 postcode area of Berwick Upon Tweed. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties onsite and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:31am on 6th March
